appDescriptionLoggedIn: Our application is designed to simplify your API interactions, making it easier to develop, test, and explore APIs in one place. We hope you enjoy it!
appDescriptionLoggedOut: Welcome to our multi-purpose API client application! This tool allows you to interact with any user-specified API, whether it's RESTful or GraphQL. To start using the application, please register or log in.

rsSchoolReactCourse.title: RS School React Course
rsSchoolReactCourse.description1: The RS School React Course is a free, online program for students with solid JavaScript and TypeScript skills. It's perfect for those who have completed RS School Stage #2 or have equivalent experience.
rsSchoolReactCourse.description2: The course includes comprehensive materials, access to a supportive community on Discord, and a certificate upon completion.
